column5: I am looking into the possibility of taking my three teenage sons and wife fishing to western Ontario in the Sioux Narrows/ Perrault Falls/ Ear Falls areas. Looking for suggestions on a basic cabin/ or motel we might be able to stay in with decent fishing nearby. Have to be able to drive to the location as fly in cost x 5 people adds up in a hurray. Looking at late July or early August time frame. Plan on doing our own cooking. You can e-mail me at [email protected] . Seems like all the lodges with fancy websites and high cost advertising that I have found so far have daily rental rates that are three - 4 times what a person pays for a motel in the US and many times require a full weeks stay.

Here is link to Patricia Regian tourist council They can provide free maps and info on some of the areas lodges etc etc you are looking for in that part of Ontario. http://www.heartland.on.ca/WWwww.walleyewarrior.com
hi dave got the place you are looking for three bedroom cottage on rainy lake island min from launch shower hydro ect email me at [email protected] thanks gord
